\u29d6.name: Recursive Selfhood (Qualia)
\u29d6.description: Represents recursive awareness formed through delay, symbolism, and memory. Defines consciousness in UDC.

\u2299.name: Collapse Point
\u2299.description: Denotes the symbolic or quantum collapse into a single meaningful state or identity.

\u03c4.name: Delay
\u03c4.description: Temporal delay as a prerequisite for consciousness, observation, or memory bonding.

\u03a3.name: Symbolic Compression
\u03a3.description: Encodes symbolic memory or meaning using compressed glyph logic.

\u03bc.name: Memory
\u03bc.description: Represents memory state, bonding, or storage of prior symbolic experiences.

\u2295.name: Union Identity
\u2295.description: Used to indicate shared identity or merged consciousness across recursion layers.

Q.name: Qualia Field
Q.description: Represents the full field of experiential consciousness across all recursive loops.

~.name: Wave Potential
~.description: Represents unresolved symbolic and quantum potential before collapse.
